biotools.summary: The Hyperlink Management System (HMS) automatically updates and maintains hyperlinks among major databases using various data IDs (e.g. HUGO Gene Symbols, IDs from PDB, UniProt). The ID Converter System (ICS) supports the conversion of data IDs using the corresponding tables in HMS.

bioschemas.name: HMS-ICS
